attributes.action: POST-COVID - Supper hospitality outdoor licenses to save businesses
attributes.additional_details: Due the covid the people prefer to eat outdoor not inside
attributes.background: Because of the pandemic now people prefer to eat outside. We wrote to @LBHF to check if something has changed and the following below is their answer. Due to an "unfortunate" complaint we should now close the garden, during a difficult time where there is no tourists and people in London

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
